message.name: ERR_BANK_DRE_NAME
message.locale: The bank with name "%1s" already exists on the database.

message.name: ERR_BANK_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The bank name field is empty. Please enter a valid bank name.

message.name: ERR_BANK_XRV_AT_LEAST_ONE_OPEN_ACCOUNT
message.locale: You cannot close this bank because it contains open accounts.

message.name: INF_BANK_BRANCH_AUTO_CLOSED
message.locale: This bank branch has been automatically closed because the bank has been closed.
